author: mingmingchan.
content: hello~I would like to run a node for the mekong testnet and explorer around. I found that there are some images https://github.com/ethpandaops/mekong-devnets/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-0/group_vars/all/images.yaml here. How could I find the source code to build for example "ethpandaops/geth:lightclient-prague-devnet-4-37035c5" this image? Thanks a lot for help!!

author: parithosh
content: git branch info and built info can be found here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/mekong
